article_text:
So we saw the Un movie, and we don’t mean “Seven Up!”

The start of our vacation two weeks ago found us watching the news in an airline lounge. We thought we’d catch the start of President Obama’s “year-end press conference,” but he was running late and our flight was not. Through the miracle of Twitter, however, before taking off we caught the newsmaking quote: “I think they made a mistake.”

He was referring to Sony Pictures’...
